comments.content:
Florian - thanks; good tip! It looks as if someone has messed a little with it (obviously on the 'O')- but this is close enough to work with. For some reason the serifs seem to disappear at the ends, which causes printing problems - now I can go back and adjust this to suit...

thanks for your time + Happy New Year!

Matt

\> _For some reason the serifs seem to disappear at the ends, which causes printing problems_

I think they might have added a white outline to slightly "eat away" the outside of the characters so the serifs would become more delicate. And the O was simply tilted and a dot added at the centre.
